text: [Chapter 17b] [Sazuki Field, Western Nolavillia]

speaker: left
text: It's getting dark, we'll have to camp out here for the night.

speaker: left
text: I see someone coming towards us, prepare for potential combat.

speaker: left
text: You! Identify youself!
???: Well this place is quite putrid, isn't it?
???: I am the great Elbon Rich of the Nation of Shade.

speaker: left
text: Nation of Shade? How did you get here?

speaker: right
text: I've followed your boat since it left Bipole.

speaker: right
text: You see, I'm here on a mission as well, a mission that I would argue is more important than yours.

speaker: right
text: I am here to retrive Healia Aid of the Territory of Sine and to bring her back to the Bipole continent.

speaker: right
text: Uhhh.... something about an arranged marriage?

speaker: left
text: What!?

speaker: right
text: Look, I couldn't care less of what it is but I'm getting paid to do this.

speaker: left
text: What are my parents trying to do this time?
(Elbon hands Healia a letter)

speaker: left
text: Wait what is this?

speaker: left
text: "As you know, our house is declining in power and we must restore it or we will lose our status. Luckly for us, we have found a Shadeian noble who is willing to help us..."

speaker: left
text: "Through this arranged marriage, we will hopefully return to our family's former glory".

speaker: right
text: You must return immediately so I can get paid.

speaker: left
text: What am I even supposed to do?

speaker: right
text: Mabye you should return so I can get paid.

speaker: right
text: I do not want to spend a second more on this horrid continent.

speaker: left
text: She's busy helping us save to world, could we deal with this later?

speaker: right
text: Will I get paid to wait?

speaker: left
text: You won't get paid if the world ends.

speaker: right
text: Well then, I suppose I must "save the world" for whatever so I can get paid the money that I deserve.
[Elbon joins your party]
[The next day...]

speaker: left
text: Hmmm? What's that noise?

speaker: left
text: Everyone! We're surrounded by Xuirists!

speaker: left
text: Prepare for battle!

speaker: left
text: We've managed to survive the attack, but it seems like the Xuirists will keep hunting us while we're in Nolavillia.

speaker: left
text: We should head to Nation as quickly as possible.
???: Hey, you there!
???: Could you open the cage I'm stuck in?

speaker: left
text: Why are you in that cage?
???: The Xuirists captured me after I escaped from the Shadow Realm.
???: I think they were going to sacrifice me.

speaker: left
text: The Shadow Realm?
???: Yeah, I'm something called a "Proto-Xuir", a failed clone of some dimensional called the "True Xuir".

speaker: left
text: You're a Xuir?
???: Yeah I just said that.
[Proton opens the cage]
???: Thanks.
???: I'd stick around, but there's something I have to do.
???: There are some other Proto-Xuirs that escaped with me, and one of them was captured by the Xuirists.

speaker: left
text: There's other Proto-Xuirs?
???: Yeah, it's not like I'm the only one.

speaker: left
text: Nolavillia is truly a strange place, to think that there would be so many other Xuirs...

speaker: left
text: Sorry, this is my first time in Nolavillia since I escaped from the Shadow Realm 20 years ago.
???: Are you also a Proto-Xuir?

speaker: left
text: Yes.
???: 20 years ago... are you Xuirond?

speaker: left
text: I don't this so.

speaker: left
text: My engraving says G3 N2.
???: Ah, so you are Xuirond.
???: We thought you died years ago.
???: Of course, we don't really remember you since we were still young.
???: I'm Xuirventh: Generation 3 Number 7.

speaker: right
text: We weren't given names so, Xuirventh is just a name I made up a few years ago.

speaker: right
text: So, what do you go by these days, Xuirond?

speaker: left
text: Proton.

speaker: right
text: Fancy name, doesn't have to do with numbers either.

speaker: right
text: You said you left, Nolavillia, but why did you come back.

speaker: right
text: Two decades later seems like a pretty strange time to return.

speaker: left
text: I'm here to stop the Shadow Realm Research Center.

speaker: right
text: Huh?

speaker: left
text: The Research Center has recently obtained a powerful item called the Holy Itucher.

speaker: left
text: With such power, they could easily end the world.

speaker: right
text: If you're heading to the Shadow Realm, you'll need to go to the Nation of Nation.

speaker: right
text: But on you're way, you'll likely pass by the Xuirist Cavern.

speaker: right
text: If you want to team up and help me free Xuirfth, I'll probably be able to convince them to help you stop the Shadow Realm.

speaker: right
text: You'll probably have to fight those Xuirists anyways.
[Recruit Xuirventh] (Q) Recruit (W) Do not recruit

speaker: right
text: Time to stop some Xuirists.
[Xuirventh has joined your party]
[Bonus Conversation Unlocked]

speaker: left
text: Yo... this place is like... weird... after us.

speaker: left
text: These vibes ain't good... we shoud probably get off of this continent...

speaker: right
text: If we leave, the world will probably end.

speaker: right
text: I don't want to be here any more than you do, but if we're the only ones who can save the world, we kind of need to be here.

speaker: right
text: You're an elite warrior, aren't you? Shouldn't you be used to this?

speaker: right
text: I've run away from protecting this world for most of my life but now that EOS member is telling me he's scared?

speaker: right
text: You're pathetic.
[Lacirtcele and Bladen leveled up!]
[Bonus Conversation Unlocked]

speaker: right
text: Scien, are you alright?

speaker: left
text: The Nation of Nation, the Altar must still stand...

speaker: left
text: That person, Xuirventh, they said they escaped from the Shadow Realm.

speaker: left
text: The only safe place in Nolavillia to hide from the Shadow Realm is in Nation.

speaker: left
text: We need to keep going.

speaker: left
text: We must retrieve the Itucher before they can destroy Nation and the rest of the world.
[Scien and Proton leveled up!]
[Xuirist Cavern]

speaker: left
text: Omega, has the dispatch responded yet?

speaker: right
text: No, sir.

speaker: right
text: It is likely that they have been defeated.

speaker: left
text: Omega, you do realize that failure will not be accepted.

speaker: right
text: Yes, yes I do.

speaker: left
text: If you fail, I will destroy them.

speaker: left
text: Do not fail.
